forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 71, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North northwest wind 6 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
